annotations.description: It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has been more to see on the pitch than in most of the other games. There wasn't any evident superiority by either side today. The home side's strategy was to maintain possession and put the opponent out of the game. While the visitors focused more on defence and catching their opponent on the break.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Alejandro Hernandez is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Wissam Ben Yedder (Sevilla) will be replaced by Luciano Vietto.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a beautiful moment! Stevan Jovetic (Sevilla) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way inside the right post. Keylor Navas just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 2:1.
Pablo Sarabia (Sevilla) sends a poor cross in from the free kick that is cleared by the head of a defender.
Sevilla are awarded a free kick.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 3 min. of added time.

Stevan Jovetic (Sevilla) decides to strike the ball towards goal, but his effort fails to threaten the goalkeeper after being well blocked by one of the defenders. Sevilla force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own
annotations.description: OWN GOAL! The free kick is whipped in and Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) is unlucky enough to head the ball into his own net. 1:1.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Today's referee Alejandro Hernandez rightly decides to book Marcelo (Real Madrid) for his harsh tackle.
Samir Nasri (Sevilla) crosses into the box from near the side line, but he doesn't connect as he wanted and it's cleared by the well organized defence. Now Sevilla have a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner, taken by Sergio Escudero (Sevilla), comes to nothing.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Samir Nasri (Sevilla) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.
Alejandro Hernandez blows his whistle. Steven N'Zonzi (Sevilla) commits a foul after dangerous play.
The game is interrupted as Wissam Ben Yedder (Sevilla) is flagged offside.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Jorge Sampaoli prepares a substitution. Iborra is replaced by Pablo Sarabia (Sevilla).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: That will be all from Toni Kroos who is being replaced by the fresh legs of Mateo Kovacic (Real Madrid).
The linesman raises his flag as one of the players from Sevilla was in an offside position.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) sends a cross into the box, but Sergio Rico comes off his line to gather the ball.
A pass by Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Pablo Sarabia (Sevilla) works the corner short.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Franco Vazquez walks off the pitch and Stevan Jovetic (Sevilla) comes on as a substitute.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) slams home the penalty with a precise low shot into the bottom left corner.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is going to take the penalty!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Sergio Escudero (Sevilla) picked up a yellow card for saying too much to the referee.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Sergio Rico (Sevilla) makes a slide tackle, but referee Alejandro Hernandez blows for a foul. Penalty! A huge opportunity to score for Real Madrid.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) has a great chance to score from deep inside the box! He creates some space for the shot, but blazes it high over the crossbar. Very bad attempt.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) sends a pass into the box, but the opposition's defence is alert to the danger and makes a clearance.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Sergio Rico intercepts the ball.
Mariano (Sevilla) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away. The linesman signals a throw in for Sevilla.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) aims for the middle of the goal, but that's an easy job for the goalkeeper. It will take more than that to test him!
Wissam Ben Yedder (Sevilla) receives a pass inside the box, controls the ball and drills it towards the left post. Unfortunately for him, Keylor Navas makes a great save to stop his effort.
Franco Vazquez (Sevilla) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) strikes from the edge of the box, but hits it really poorly and sends the ball way over the bar.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 40386.
The free kick is delivered by Samir Nasri (Sevilla) but it's not one of his best and is easily cleared.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) commits a rough challenge and Alejandro Hernandez blows his whistle for an infringement. Free kick. Sevilla will probably just try to cross the ball in from here.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Franco Vazquez (Sevilla) takes a short corner kick.
Franco Vazquez (Sevilla) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels towards the crossbar, but Keylor Navas easily deals with the threat. Sevilla earn a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Samir Nasri (Sevilla) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
Victor Vitolo (Sevilla) dinks a cross into the box in an attempt to find one of his teammates, but the defence manages to clear. The ball goes out of play and Sevilla have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The game restarts for the second half.

The game can't be described as attractive. We are hoping against hope that the second half will bring more exciting moments and goal opportunities. Neither team has really been able to control the flow of the game. The home side have dominated the possession and midfield so far. The visitors have spent most of their time defending and waiting for the right moment to launch counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: There will be nothing more to see in the first half. The whistle blowing of Alejandro Hernandez has ended it.
The linesman raises his flag for offside before Franco Vazquez (Sevilla) heads on.
Steven N'Zonzi (Sevilla) is penalised for a foul. Alejandro Hernandez had a clear view and blows his whistle.
Iborra (Sevilla) fails to send a pass into the box as his effort is cut out.

What a sensational goal that would have been! Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) picks up the ball inside the box and fires a beautiful first time shot, but it goes just a few inches wide of the right post. The ball goes out of play and Sevilla will have a goal kick.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) slips past one challenge, but is unable to feed a low pass into the path of one of his teammates.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by Franco Vazquez (Sevilla).
Wissam Ben Yedder (Sevilla) produces a quality cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball and spanks it away. Sevilla will take a corner kick.

A big opportunity is wasted by Samir Nasri (Sevilla), who makes a yard for himself and produces a mid range rocket of a shot towards the middle of the goal. Unfortunately for him, Keylor Navas pulls off a fantastic save to stop the effort.
Franco Vazquez (Sevilla) unleashes a shot, but his effort is poor and floats high over the bar.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Iborra (Sevilla) has to be very careful for the rest of the match after receiving a yellow card from the referee for a bad tackle on an opponent.
Sevilla are ruled offside.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is unlucky with a goal bound effort from the edge of the box. Some classy goalkeeping by Sergio Rico stops the ball out of the bottom right corner.

Samir Nasri (Sevilla) produces an effort from the edge of the box, but doesn't hit the ball properly and sends it yards over the bar.
Good defending. Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) tries to find Cristiano Ronaldo inside the box, but the pass is cut out.
Alejandro Hernandez blows his whistle after Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle.
Steven N'Zonzi (Sevilla) finds enough space to climb high and plants a header way over the bar. What a poor effort.

annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted.
Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack. Real Madrid win a corner.

Sevilla keep hold of the ball with numerous one two passes, but one error and they surrender possession.

Sevilla have not tasted defeat in their last 3 games.

It was a good decision to watch today's encounter. There has been more to see on the pitch than in most of the other games. There wasn't any evident superiority by either side today. The home side's strategy was to maintain possession and put the opponent out of the game. While the visitors focused more on defence and catching their opponent on the break.
